mapper.select: WITH DAY_INF AS ( SELECT DATES FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(START_DT+LEVEL-1,'YYYYMMDD') DATES /*날짜*/ , TO_CHAR (START_DT+LEVEL-1,'D') DAYS /*요일*/ FROM ( SELECT TRUNC(TO_DATE(#{endDt}),'MM') START_DT /*시작년월일*/ , TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(#{endDt})),'DD')) END_DT /*마지막 날짜*/ FROM DUAL ) A CONNECT BY LEVEL <= A.END_DT ) TM WHERE 1=1 AND TM.DAYS NOT IN ('1', '7') /*일요일,토요일 제외*/ AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM T_CMZ_HLDY_M S1 /*T:휴일기본*/ WHERE SUBSTR(S1.HLDY_APPY_START_DTM,1,8) = TM.DATES AND S1.TENANT_ID = 'TNT_WELLS' AND S1.HLDY_USE_YN = 'Y' AND S1.DEL_YN = 'N' ) ORDER BY DATES DESC ) SELECT DATES AS LAST_DATE FROM DAY_INF WHERE ROWNUM = 1
